titleStmt.title: Episcopacie by divine right. Asserted, by Jos. Hall, B. of Exon
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R[ichard] B[adger] for Nathanael Butter, at the Pide-Bull by S. Augustine's Gate,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 12661a on UMI microfilm reel 595, and as 12661 on reel 1103.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and Yale University. Library.
Appears at reel 595 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy) and at reel 1103 (Yale University. Library copy).
